doc.field: Synergy Group is offering 85 mln dlrs of senior subordinated notes due 1997 with an 11-5/8 coupon and par pricing, said sole manager L.F. Rothschild, Unterberg, Towbin Inc. Non-redeemable for five years, the notes are rated B-3 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and B-plus by Standard and Poor's Corp. The issue was increased from an initial offering of 75 mln dlrs. Reuter
